content: single_crochet in single_crochet big-fan in next tt single_crochet in next single_crochet fan in tt through last tt single_crochet in 2nd treble_crochet of tt fan around tch center has a single_crochet fans = tt + 2 tt-over-big-fan = skip 1st treble_crochet single_crochet in 2nd treble_crochet ch2 skip 3rd treble_crochet tt in half_double_crochet ch2 skip 4th treble_crochet single_crochet in 5th treble_crochet ch2 skip 6th treble_crochet row 3 tt-over-big-fan row ch6 turn tt in 5th chain from hook ch2 single_crochet-in-fan ch2 tt in next single_crochet ch2 to big-fan tt-over-big-fan tt in single_crochet ch2 single_crochet-in-fan ch2 tt in single_crochet 2 times ch2 tt-over-big-fan tt in next single_crochet ch2 single_crochet-in-fan ch2 through last fan tt around tch center has a tt tt = fans + 3 treble fantasy v 3 april 26 2017 - page 7 of 13 row 4 normal fan-in-tt row ch6 turn fan in 5th chain from hook single_crochet in next chain fan in tt single_crochet in next single_crochet fan in tt through last tt single_crochet in 2nd treble_crochet of tt fan around tch center has a fan fans = tt + 2 repeat row 1-4 for desired size each 4-row repeat adds 8 fans count your tts after each row 1 and after each row 4 and write them down to keep track working row 2 and 3 adds 5 tts working row 4 and then 1 adds 3 tts to move to the next section you need to end after either a row 1 or a row 3 with a multiple of 2 + 1 tts or a multiple of 4 + 3 tts if you wish a feather at the center in the next section you can work an additional row 4 and row 1 after a row 1 if necessary to force the parity of your tt count to odd to get your shawl the size of mine you would work 15 row in section 2 which would give you 69 tts at the end of row 3 mine did not have a center feather treble fantasy v 3 april 26 2017 - page 8 of 13 section 3 feather and bar edging i worked this section with a snug hand especially on the chains i suggest you do that or switch to a smaller size hook whichever you prefer dtri = double_crochet triangle = double_crochet ch2 double_crochet worked in same place row 1 ch7 turn work treble_crochet ch1 2 times treble_crochet in 6th chain from hook ch2 skip chain treble_crochet work dtri in ch2-space of tt ch2 skip treble_crochet ch2 single_crochet ch2 work treble_crochet in 1st treble_crochet of tt ch1 treble_crochet ch1 6 times in ch2-space of tt treble_crochet in 2nd treble_crochet of tt ch2 skip ch2-space single_crochet ch2-space treble_crochet work dtri in ch2-space of tt ch2 through last tt treble_crochet ch1 3 times treble_crochet around tch 4tr at ends of row dtri-in-dtri = skip chain-space before dtri and 1st double_crochet of dtri work double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in ch2-space of dtri skip 2nd double_crochet of dtri and
